problems.title: Same Alphabet Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern where each row contains the same uppercase letter repeated, starting from 'A'.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print an alphabet triangle with N rows. Each row should print the same letter repeated as many times as the row number. Row 1 has 'A', row 2 has 'B', etc.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
A
BB
CCC
DDDD
EEEEE

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
A
BB
CCC

testCases.expectedOutput:
A
BB
CCC
DDDD
EEEEE
FFFFFF
GGGGGGG

hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop for rows (1 to N), inner loop prints the letter corresponding to current row ('A' + row - 1) repeated for the current row number of times.
